member.name: T:WatsonDedupe.CallbackMethods
member.summary: Callback methods used to to read, write, or delete a chunk.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.CallbackMethods.WriteChunk
member.summary: Write a chunk. Passes the Chunk object; you must return true.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.CallbackMethods.ReadChunk
member.summary: Read a chunk. Passes the the chunk's key as a string; you must return the byte array data of the chunk.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.CallbackMethods.DeleteChunk
member.summary: Delete a chunk. Passes the chunk's key; you must return true;

member.name: T:WatsonDedupe.Chunk
member.summary: Represents a chunk of data identified during deduplication.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.Key
member.summary: The key of the chunk.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.Length
member.summary: The length of the chunk data.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.Position
member.summary: The order of the chunk within the current object.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.Address
member.summary: The address of the chunk within the current object.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.Value
member.summary: The byte data of the chunk.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates the object.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64)
member.summary: Instantiates the object.
member.param: The length of the chunk data.
The order of the chunk within the object.
The address of the chunk within the current object.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Chunk.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Instantiates the object.
member.param: The length of the chunk data.
The order of the chunk within the object.
The address of the chunk within the current object.
The byte data of the chunk.

member.summary: Converts a DataRow to a Chunk.

member.name: T:WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider
member.summary: External database provider.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider.IsInitialized
member.summary: Method to determine if the database has been initialized, generally by checking for the existence of rows in the dedupe configuration table.

member.summary: Add configuration-related data by key for deduplication operations.

member.summary: Retrieve configuration-related data by key for deduplication operations.

member.summary: Check if a chunk exists.

member.summary: Check if an object exists.

member.summary: List objects stored in the database.

member.summary: Add a chunk for an object.

member.summary: Add multiple chunks for an object.

member.summary: Delete an object and dereference the associated chunks.
member.param: List of chunk keys that should be garbage collected.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider.IncrementChunkRefcount(System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Increment reference count for a chunk.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider.DecrementChunkRefcount(System.String,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Decrement reference count for a chunk.
member.param: True if the chunk data can be garbage collected.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider.IndexStats(System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int64@,System.Int64@,System.Decimal@,System.Decimal@)
member.summary: Retrieve statistics for the index.
member.param: The number of objects stored in the index.
The number of chunks stored in the index.
The amount of data stored in the index, i.e. the full size of the original data.
The number of bytes consumed by chunks of data, i.e. the deduplication set size.
Deduplication ratio represented as a multiplier.
Deduplication ratio represented as a percentage.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider.BackupDatabase(System.String)
member.summary: Backup the deduplication database, not including chunk data, to another file.

member.name: T:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary
member.summary: Library for deduplication of objects.

member.summary: Enable or disable console logging for deduplication operations.

member.name: F:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary.DebugSql
member.summary: Enable or disable console logging for SQL operations.

member.name: F:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary.Callbacks
member.summary: Callback methods used by the dedupe library to read, write, and delete chunks.

member.name: P:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary.Database
member.summary: Specify the database provider. If null, a local Sqlite database will be used.

member.summary: Initialize an existing index using an internal Sqlite database.
member.param: Method to call to write a chunk to storage.
Method to call to read a chunk from storage.
Method to call to delete a chunk from storage.
Enable console logging for deduplication operations.
Enable console logging for SQL operations.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary.#ctor(WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider,System.Func{WatsonDedupe.Chunk,System.Boolean},System.Func{System.String,System.Byte[]},System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialize an existing index using an external database. Tables must be created ahead of time.
member.param: Database provider implemented using the Database.DbProvider class.
Method to call to write a chunk to storage.
Method to call to read a chunk from storage.
Method to call to delete a chunk from storage.
Enable console logging for deduplication operations.
Enable console logging for SQL operations.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{WatsonDedupe.Chunk,System.Boolean},System.Func{System.String,System.Byte[]},System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new index using an internal Sqlite database.
member.param: Minimum chunk size, must be divisible by 8, divisible by 64, and 128 or greater.
Maximum chunk size, must be divisible by 8, divisible by 64, and at least 8 times larger than minimum chunk size.
Number of bytes to shift while identifying chunk boundaries, must be less than or equal to minimum chunk size.
Number of bytes to examine while checking for a chunk boundary, must be 8 or fewer.
Method to call to write a chunk to storage.
Method to call to read a chunk from storage.
Method to call to delete a chunk from storage.
Enable console logging for deduplication operations.
Enable console logging for SQL operations.

member.name: M:WatsonDedupe.DedupeLibrary.#ctor(WatsonDedupe.Database.DbProvider,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{WatsonDedupe.Chunk,System.Boolean},System.Func{System.String,System.Byte[]},System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create a new index using an external database. Tables must be created ahead of time.
member.param: Database provider implemented using the Database.DbProvider class.
Minimum chunk size, must be divisible by 8, divisible by 64, and 128 or greater.
Maximum chunk size, must be divisible by 8, divisible by 64, and at least 8 times larger than minimum chunk size.
Number of bytes to shift while identifying chunk boundaries, must be less than or equal to minimum chunk size.
Number of bytes to examine while checking for a chunk boundary, must be 8 or fewer.
Method to call to write a chunk to storage.
Method to call to read a chunk from storage.
Method to call to delete a chunk from storage.
Enable console logging for deduplication operations.
Enable console logging for SQL operations.
